      • init

        public void init(java.lang.String[] args,
                 RefDataSession refDataSession)
        Initializes EDF consumer's Gap Request Session It is responsible for: Initializing command line options used by the application. Parsing command line arguments. Initializing connection. Sending login request. Initializing ping handler.
        Parameters:
        args -

      • processResponse

        public void processResponse(ChannelSession chnl,
                            com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport.TransportBuffer buffer)
        Call back method to process responses from channel. Processing responses consists of performing a high level decode of the message and then calling the applicable specific method for further processing.
        Specified by:
        processResponse in interface ResponseCallback
        Parameters:
        chnl - - The channel of the response
        buffer - - The message buffer containing the response.
